§n§acs.SD§r§r
§6§lHarmony Explained: Progress Towards A Scientific Theory of Music§r

§8§oDaniel Shawcross Wilkerson§r

§72014§r
Comments: \u00a77\u00a7oSay more directly that theory of Helmholtz implies harmony would not exist as a phenomenon at all. Elaborate on the mythical \
red herring, saying it arises from the visual metaphor. Replace \
as the term for chord of two interlocked fifths; pointout that the metaphor originating the term \
is a red herring. Thank some readers for their feedback\u00a7r
